    • Method Detail

      • addRoom

        void addRoom(int type,
             int count)
        In the method, we need to create a kind of type rooms for count times
        Parameters:
        type - the test cases for type only have two values: 0 and 1
        type==0 represent the LuxuryRoom
        type==1 represent the OrdinaryRoom
        count - how many room we want to add

      • addRoom

        void addRoom(Room room)
        Parameters:
        room - can be an instance of LuxuryRoom or OrdinaryRoom

      • setPrice

        void setPrice(int type,
              double price)
        Parameters:
        type - the test cases for type only have two values: 0 and 1
        type==0 represent the LuxuryRoom
        type==1 represent the OrdinaryRoom
        price - the new basic price of the current type of room

      • getPrice

        double getPrice(int type)
        Parameters:
        type - the test cases for type only have two values 0 and 1
        type==0 represent the LuxuryRoom
        type==1 represent the OrdinaryRoom
        Returns:
        the basic price of the current type of room

      • getRoomPrice

        double getRoomPrice(java.lang.String number)
        How to calculate total price for checked room?
        • Luxury Room
          Basic price of Luxury Room * the rate of price in current day + the price of add bed (if need)
        • Ordinary Room
          Basic price of Ordinary Room * the rate of price in current day + the price of breakfast * the number of breakfast.
        Parameters:
        number - the number of room
        Returns:
        If the current status of the room is unchecked, return 0, or else return the total price of the room for current day.

      • displayAllRooms

        void displayAllRooms()
        invoke toString method in the Room class to display all rooms

      • getAllCheckedRooms

        java.util.List<Room> getAllCheckedRooms()
        Put all checked rooms from rooms into a List
        Returns:
        a list which contains all checked rooms by ascending order of room number

      • displayEveryDayInfo

        void displayEveryDayInfo()
        invoke the toString method for all instances in enum class Day in default order

      • displayTodayInfo

        void displayTodayInfo()
        invoke the toString method for one time in enum class Day to print today information

      • checkIn

        void checkIn(int type,
             int number)
        The process of checkIn including
        1. Which room can be checked? Find all unchecked rooms of specific type.
          In all unchecked room, find the minimum room number.
        2. change the checkIn field of the room to be true
        Parameters:
        type - the test cases for type only have two values 0 and 1
        type==0 represent the LuxuryRoom
        type==1 represent the OrdinaryRoom
        number -
        1. if type==0, the test cases of number only have two values 2 and 3
          number==2 represent there are two people checked in the room
          number==3 represent there are three people checked in the room, an additional bed is needed
        2. if type==1, the test cases of number only have three values 0,1 and 2 which means how many breakfast reserved

      • checkOut

        void checkOut(java.lang.String... roomNumber)
        The process of check out, including
        • Calculate the total incomes for all checked rooms
        • change the enum type day to the next day
        • change the checkIn field to be false for all rooms which number is in parameters
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - arrays of room numbers that would be checked out today

      • income

        double income()
        The first step of doing checkOut(String...) is to calculate the total incomes, here we needs the result of the calculation.
        Returns:
        The total income of Yesterday

      • income

        double income(int recentTimes)
        The total income of recent times.
        Parameters:
        recentTimes - For example, if recentTimes==2, we needs all incomes of yesterday and the day before yesterday
        Returns:
        the total income in recent times
